data.title: Travel to Newark, NJ for North to Shore
data.meta_description: With so much public transportation available, Newark is easy to reach for North to Shore this year. Check out the restaurants, hotels, and amenities nearby!
data.text:
Newark has two NJ Transit train stations: Newark Penn Station and Newark Broad Street Station. The stations connect bus, light rail, and train service from New York City and New Jersey to the following lines:

Newark Penn Station

Northeast Corridor Line

North Jersey Coast Line

Raritan Valley Line

Amtrak

PATH

Newark Light Rail

Newark Broad Street Station

Montclair-Boonton Line

Morris & Essex Line

Main/Bergen Line

Pascack Valley Line

Newark Light Rail

Newark Light Rail

You can also access North to Shore via the Newark Light Rail, which runs throughout most of Newark, including service at NJPAC/Center Street Station, and into nearby Belleville and Bloomfield. Visit the NJ TRANSIT website for details on light rail tickets and service.

Many bus lines operate throughout Newark, serving destinations such as the Prudential Center and NJPAC. For information on NJ TRANSIT bus service and schedules, please visit the NJ TRANSIT website and plan your trip.

Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) is a major airport hub for United Airlines. With over 30 airlines flying into and out of EWR daily, you are able to safely and easily arrive in New Jersey for North to Shore! Hop on a quick bus or NJ TRANSIT train, grab a cab, or rent a car and travel the short distance to Downtown Newark.

Newark International Airport is a major airport hub for United Airlines. With over 30 airlines flying into and out of EWR daily, you are able to safely and easily arrive in New Jersey for North to Shore! Hop on a quick bus or train, grab a cab, or rent a car and travel the short distance to Downtown Newark.

The City of Newark is proud to offer free shuttle services during North 2 Shore weekend on June 29th & June 30th 12PM-10PM. Free shuttle services will be available in each ward on both days and run every 2 hours to and from the wards. Please carefully view the pick-up/drop-off locations and contact information.

Shuttles will run every 2 hours from all the following locations:

(12PM, 2PM, 4PM, 6PM, 8PM)

West Ward Pick Up Locations

Ivy Hill Park

Boylan Street Recreation Center

Littleton Avenue and South Orange Avenue

Roseville Avenue and Orange Street

Newark Penn Station

There are many hotels available in and around Newark. Whether you want to stay closer to the venues in downtown Newark or closer to the airport so you can sleep in before you catch your flight home, we’ve got options! Here are a few offering exclusive discounts through North2Shore.

Courtyard Newark Downtown

858 Broad St, Newark, NJ 07102

Special Rate: 209 USD per night for bookings Wednesday, June 21, 2023 – Sunday, June 25, 2023. Book Now Through Thursday, June 1

DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Newark Airport

128 Frontage Road, Newark, NJ 07114

Special Rates Available for Sunday, June 18 – Wednesday, June 28, 2023 – Book Now

160 Frontage Road, Newark, NJ 07114

Special Rates: Use code GOOD NEIGHBOR – Book Now

Newark Liberty International Airport Marriott

1 Hotel Road Newark, New Jersey 07114

Special Rate: $159/night for bookings Wednesday, June 21, 2023 – Sunday, June 25, 2023. Book Now Through Wednesday, June 7, 2023

Even if it’s the summer, you can still ride the slopes! When you visit Newark, be sure to take some time for a yoga class, play some basketball, or learn how to box!
